item.title: Bill add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Bill add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Bill add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Bill add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Bill add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bill add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Bill add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Bill add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Bill add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "She was wearing a pair of my pajamas with the sleeves rolled up. When she laughed I wanted her again. A minute later she asked me if I loved her. I told her it didn't mean anything but that I didn't think so. She looked sad. But as we were fixing lunch, and for no apparent reason, she laughed in such a way that I kissed her." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Bill add a quote by Norman Mailer
item.description: "There is a no man's land between sex and love, and it alters in the night." -- Norman Mailer

item.title: Bill add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Bill add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I have a theory that the truth is never told during the nine-to-five hours." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Bill add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "My alma mater was books, a good library.... I could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Bill add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I'm a human being, first and foremost, and as such I'm for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Bill add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Bill add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "If you have no critics you'll likely have no success. " -- Malcolm X

item.title: Bill add a quote by Larry McMurtry
item.description: "If you wait, all that happens is that you get older." -- Larry McMurtry

item.title: Bill add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Ask not what your country can do for you; ask what you can do for your country." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Bill add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Bill add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Whether they be young in spirit, or young in age, the members of the Democratic Party must never lose that youthful zest for new ideas and for a better world, which has made us great." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Bill add a quote by Howard Zinn
item.description: "There is no flag large enough to cover the shame of killing innocent people." -- Howard Zinn

item.title: Bill add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Bill add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Bill add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Bill add a quote by Robert F. Kennedy
item.description: "There are those that look at things the way they are, and ask why? I dream of things that never were, and ask why not?" -- Robert F. Kennedy
